title: Empirical Study
subject: Science

title: Interdisciplinary Nature
subject: Science
content: Science encompasses various branches like physics, chemistry, biology, astronomy, and earth sciences, often leading to collaborative research.

title: Scientific Method
subject: Science
content: Scientists use the scientific method, a systematic approach, to investigate and answer questions through observation, hypothesis testing, and analysis.

title: Advancement of Knowledge
subject: Science

title: Ethical Considerations
subject: Science
